Notes: (need information about whether or not the fire DoT sticks to the player while dealing damage with Flamethrower ammo)

Empty reload = 5.55s (2.2s for 1st shell, 1.1s for 2nd then 3rd shell, 0.9s for 4th then 5th shell, then 1.35s for 6th shell).  Tactical reload from 1-4 shells = 1.35s for 1st shell, 0.9s for subsequent shells, then 0.65s for last shell.  Tactical reload from 5 shells = 1.1s.  Firing the weapon will cancel the reload animation.
Rounds detonate on impact after the 1st bounce. Maximum fuse time = 2.5s. Explosion inner radius = 1.5m.
Cannot hit multiple targets in one swing.
LMB combo = 65 damage, then 80 damage, then 90 damage.  Has a 3-4m range.
Damage is per hit in a 3-hit combo.  Has a 3m radius.
